resources.string: Enable WebView debugging and add vConsole in it. Support WebView, TBS X5, UC U4, Crosswalk(XWalk), XWeb.
Your donation is the biggest motivation for my developing
Manage some loadable resources here, such as vConsole
Used to pull cloud rules, pull part of hooking resources, etc
GitHub is more recommended for global users. FastGit is more recommended for users in mainland China. Of course, you can use other custom data source.
